outputs.output_descr: Institutional Strengthening and Capacity Building Result in More Effective Fund Operations. The Project addresses capacity building needs of the implementing organization, the Fund Management Department, to enable the National Irrigated Land Reclamation Fund to meet the project objective. The focus of capacity building will be on streamlining institutional responsibilities, enhancing the technical capacity of the Fund Management Department staff with respect to irrigated land reclamation and management, modernizing project preparation and appraisal systems, improving the legal framework for irrigated land reclamation, demonstrating effective methods of land reclamation, and improving the Fund's interaction with international donors.

project_descr: Capacity Building for the National Land Reclamation Fund
